website_summaries.verdict: A no-frills monitor with features you'll appreciate, like a gentle night-light and an intercom.
pros: Features 2-way talk and a battery-saving mode
It transmits across most homes with ease, helping you keep tabs on babies and toddlers
cons: Some customers report charging problems and issues with battery life

customer_reviews.title: Works for Puppies too!
customer_reviews.text: Took a long time to charge and then ran out fast, less than 15 hours. We need it only at night for about 6-7 hours to monitor our puppy for unexpected potty breaks. It works well enough so we can hear if he barks and it was inexpensive. Just wished the charging time was shorter and that it held the charge a little longer. A power outage disconnects the monitors and you will have to restart the baby Update: customer service was quick to respond and fix the situation.
customer_reviews.author: CW2010

customer_reviews.title: Battery is horrible.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great and the distance is good. But the parent unit never charged. As soon as i received it i charged it for 5 hours without any use. Then used it for 20 minutes and the battery died. The light never turns green no matter how long I charge it for.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: 1 Power Adapter for 2 Units???
customer_reviews.text: Includes just one power adapter. How are you supposed to charge the second unit? You either have to purchase a separate adapter. They included a note card stating that they can ship out the second power adapter, but I needed the item to use today...why do I have to wait now to get the power adapter. This is really bizare. Also there's not other way to charge the units...it doesn't appear you can use the batteries. I think the description should state this clearly. If you don't have the second adapter this item is pretty much useless.
customer_reviews.author: treyvus

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY...DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this thing, it was almost a five-star product. I bought it based on that. I’m wondering if some reviews were taken down because now it shows 150 and only three stars and I pay attention to the number of reviews as well as the quality of reviews. That said the product is hot garbage. It works maybe a day. Maybe. After that my kid was screaming for me upstairs which of course I didn’t know and came downstairs in tears because he was scared and yelling and we didn’t come. Do. Not. Buy. This. Product. Hopefully, it will never be available again. It’s off brand garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Peyton C.

customer_reviews.title: Dads on baby duty
customer_reviews.text: Yep, I am always on baby duty, and still trying to work from home. I have a home office that is detached from the house and got this baby monitor to allow my young son (18 months) to sleep an me to work. The range is great, works well, reception is good and gives me peace of mind. A must for parents that want to monitor their kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: MikeSmith

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is terrible I'm returning it immediately. One adapter for both monitors is ridiculous, the parent nightlight button does nothing, same with the intercom button nothing happens. They aren't syncing it just beeps like it can't handle the range. Might be a defective model but I hate everything about this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive in more than one way. Sound sensitive. Yes. Power surges. YES, TOO!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd unit. Both failed after a power failure. The ease of use and sound quality are fantastic. However, neither unit survived after the power grid failed and came back on. Must be sensitive to power surges. In spite of that weakness, I will probably buy again because when it works, it is a fantastic and sound sensitive monitor. I just wish it could survive the power surges on our electrical system.
customer_reviews.author: KY girl

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good monitor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor did it's job. It actually picked up noise easily. I could hear things going on outside of the baby's room. It did do a weird "sleep" mode sometimes. It wasn't a big deal, you just have to hit the power button to wake it up. The parent monitor has stopped working for me. But that could be because we let the baby play with it. I will just buy this product again because I know how it works.
customer_reviews.author: BAAMM808

customer_reviews.title: Best Monitor Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best baby monitor! I’ve had 3 kids and I’ve done the video ones before but I just wanted a simple monitor without all the background humming noise and great sound quality. This system is perfect! Great battery life on parent unit, built in soft glow night light on baby unit, and super easy to use. I highly recommend these!!! And you can’t beat the price for such great quality
customer_reviews.author: R Greenwoood

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it! Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a monitor for our little one and we wanted something simple, plain and functional. While this product is plain it certainly isn’t functional. The beeping noise it makes on the parent unit is constant! It continues to beep about 2 beeps per second and never stops no matter where I’m the house we take it. My plan was to return it but I have a newborn and 8 other kiddos. I just didnt have time to return it so we’ve just shoved it on the corner and dont use it. This product is a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: mell

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else!!
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty easy to use, didn’t come with enough power outlet chargers, we are returning bc there was an absolutely horrible mechanical sound no matter what we did. We thought maybe it was interference from another monitor or something else electrical we had, but after turning off ALL power to EVERYTHING in the house, but these two units we realized it must be an issue with the monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Charles M. Taylor II

customer_reviews.title: Works great for two weeks
customer_reviews.text: Was working great for the first two weeks... now doesn't work at all. Keeps making a ridiculous buzzing sound as if the units are connecting all of a sudden. Threw away packaging and now can't return anything.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Saved my mom's life.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very easy system to set up, just plug it in and charge it. I use it to make sure my mom is alright at night. I can talk to her if I need to and her answers come in very clearly. It's been a few weeks since I gave this review. I just wanted to add that I heard my mom fall in the bathroom from across the house through a closed door through this monitor. If I had not had it she would have laid on the floor all night. It saved her life.
customer_reviews.author: G. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality - 7 months of intermittent use
customer_reviews.text: Willcare Baby Monitor, Portable Digital Audio Baby Monitor with Up to 1000ft Operating Range, Two-Way Talking Feature, Heavy-Duty Rechargeable Battery & HD Sound Listening System Seven months after purchase, this item stopped working. I only used this item two-three times a week. It now only produces intermittent static, no matter how close or far away the monitors are from one another. Contacted Amazon seller "BangTai store" requesting assistance with this issue. Two weeks later, no response. Disappointed in Amazon - their vetting of third-party sellers and corresponding customer service seem to be taking a sideline to profit.
customer_reviews.author: Scaramanga

customer_reviews.title: Talkback stopped working after just 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Got this monitor basically for when we would travel and need to bring something mobile (not our more robust home system w/video cams etc.) or for when we have guests w/little ones in the extra rooms in the house that don't have video monitors.... they worked ok, have a "noise gate" kind of thing where it's silent until a particularly 'louder' noise is made I guess, which was fine, but the TalkBack feature broke only weeks after having them and that was pretty essential to us obviously calming the crying baby etc. - will be ordering a different monitor now to replace
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize how much I need a small display screen to tell me what the volume is on this monitor. Our other monitor will show us if it is on volume level 1-5, this one you just have to guess, and at 3 am when you want it on but not too loud, that’s a lot of effort. I returned it and wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: This does the job
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set up, though a bit confusing about whether the lights are on using the separate units. It does the job--allowing a senior caregiver to hear if the senior is in distress or needs assistance during the night. We haven't had it long enough to know how long the battery lasts--and it is plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: MGK

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor - but battery issues
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this monitor 5 stars except for some reason, it randomly won’t accept a charge despite being plugged in, and it will begin doing the “I’m dying” beeping noise it makes which is super fun at 4am. I am going to request a replacement and hopefully the issue just with this one. Otherwise it is a great monitor for the price! Excellent sound quality and range. It also allows you to turn on and off a nightlight on the unit for the kid’s Room, and you can ever speak with them! I was not expecting that.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen w. hofstetter

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I had it set up for two days. Second day would not connect the units. No matter what I did or where I placed the units I could not get the units to connect. I sent it back and purchased a $15 monitor and it works fine. Plus the new one has two power adapters so no batteries.
customer_reviews.author: SmithReading

customer_reviews.title: Malfunction - is there a solution for this???
customer_reviews.text: SELLER PLEASE READ IF THERE IS A SOLUTION I WILL UPDATE MY REVIEW This worked great for a few weeks, but one month in it is malfunctioning. The sound on the parent unit only stays on for about ten seconds then goes silent until I push a button to ‘wake it back up.’ Is there a solution for this? It’s way too soon for this to be broken I just got it
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: purchased monitor for my sick mother when she stayed with me
customer_reviews.text: The model I purchased I can hear my Mom when she speaks to me, but to speak with her through the monitor I have to push a button (like a walkie talkie). This is hard to do at 2 am when it's dark. Other than that issue I've been pleased with the purchase. Long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: We bought this 5 months ago; use it 4 days a week for about 2 hours each day. We keep the baby's end plugged in, and charge the receiving end every night. It stopped working today. Did some troubleshooting, but found good reason for that.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wider

customer_reviews.title: Baby monitor not working
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a baby shower gift. Got it early so I would not forget to get a gift. It was returned to me after baby was born because it didn’t work. Unfortunately the window for returning it had closed so I am stuck with a baby monitor that does not work and I still had to send another gift. Felt horrible about the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Using to monitor elder woman at night time.
customer_reviews.text: The first time the parent unit was taken off the charger, the battery ran out rather quickly. It only comes with one wall adapter. We now keep it plugged in all the time. It is being used for an elderly woman who's ill and night time is most important for it's use. In that respect it is good quality. Sound is loud and clear.
customer_reviews.author: oew

customer_reviews.title: Very sensitive!
customer_reviews.text: The sounds is very very sensitive! We always keep it on in the house. Me and my husband enjoy playing around with the communication button. Don’t prank your wife by playing the scary Halloween sounds through this...
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Helping Mom
customer_reviews.text: I do not have a baby, however my older mother lives with me and she feel so I got this to hear her call if she needed something in the middle of the night. I am happy with the product and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Monahan

customer_reviews.title: Parent unit can no longer charge
customer_reviews.text: Worked past one week of return window. It was great up until the parent unit could no longer charge. There seems to be a design flaw in the type of connection and it no longer keeps the connection. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Rivoli

customer_reviews.title: Seller not responding to warranty related issue
customer_reviews.text: Within 4 months of purchasing the monitor, the portable piece (the parent unit) stopped charging. Seller is not responding to emails, despite their claim of 18-month warranty. Enough said....
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: LOW quality and NO customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit on July 28 2019 and it became malfunctioning on September 14. The parent unit would not be charged and could only hear from the baby unit less than 30 seconds then shut off itself. I have tried to reach out the seller since September 16 (email and phone calls) but so far got NO responses. Don't buy this item when you need it 24/7 for your special need child.
customer_reviews.author: P. Sun

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best baby monitor I have ever used. I’ve needed one for over 16 years to hear my special needs son at night and wow, it’s amazing! You hear everything with no interference. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: JGundy

customer_reviews.title: This Monitor meets all Needs
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor for many reasons. During my overnight shifts taking care of Seniors, I can be in the basement doing wash and still clearly hear my patient. The best part is being able to push a button and talk to them if needed. The range and charge life are both better than any other product I used before. The portable unit has a clip that you can attach on your clothes making it "hands free."
customer_reviews.author: Dovergirl9

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for use with elderly but...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is quite good, easy to use, includes flashlight feature...UPDATE: However, after about a month, the "parent" unit stopped holding any charge, so now the system has been rendered entirely non-functional
customer_reviews.author: Jay Passer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, budget friendly, audio baby monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Got this so I can hear my pup when he's in his crate at night. Excellent sound quality. I love that it has 2 way audio, so that I can tell him I'm on my way when he whines to go out. The fact that both the parent & child unit use micro USB makes it very convenient!
customer_reviews.author: hera94

customer_reviews.title: Charging port stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I loved this monitor until the charging port stopped working. We have two units, both under 9 months old. One is completely dysfunctional now (cannot charge as the port is coming detached) and the other will only charge with a rubber band to hold it in place. I wish the charging port were more durable. Otherwise this was a terrific monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Sky

customer_reviews.title: Best baby monitor ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this because I can enjoy peace of mind to hear my child without obnoxious feedback. I really enjoy being able to talk to my child when he gets a little fussy in the middle of the night and it calms him back to sleep without even having to get up. I recommend this product to parents with children of all ages!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work after a month and half
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this product. At first I was really happy because it was a simple monitor and even though after awhile the battery life wasn't the best I thought well thats ok I'll just keep it charged or something. Also it was working so I thought it was fine, but wow, after a month and half it completely doesn't even work anymore. Now I have to look for another one. I would have been way more ok if the battery was bad but it still worked but nope, it doesn't even work anymore!!
customer_reviews.author: Jin Kim

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommed!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The sound is very clear but what I like the most is that it doesn’t reflect the sounding machine in baby’s room since it’s a steady sound it goes silent and only comes up when baby makes a sound. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tmf

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Picks up a lot of extra sounds, I can hear the dog from across the street barking. Does what it’s supposed to. Great travel monitor
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Worked great - not just for babies
customer_reviews.text: I had an adult son in the hospital, when he got out, I needed to be able to hear him if something happened in the night, this monitor was perfect for that!
customer_reviews.author: Jeri

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I owned this monitor for 3 months and the parent unit just quit working. I have special needs children and use this to monitor them while they are in their room. The battery life on the parent unit was maybe 4 hours. It does not come with a wall plug for parent unit so you will have to order one or use one from another device. The sound quality was good. I was able to hear the hum of the fan at night time but it didnt drown out the sound of the children.
customer_reviews.author: SEREASA D TODD

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Sound is perfect. The base needs to remain plugged in bc it doesn't hold charge well. Good range. Overall a good purchase and fit the need we had.
customer_reviews.author: spesod

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how I feel yet
customer_reviews.text: It seems run low on power after a day's use. the sound is perfect, and I can plug it in across the room and my husband just has to say....Hey Deb can you help me and I hear him perfectly. But constantly charging it is a pet peeve.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Loved having this to transfer baby from our room to her own room! The sound is great, no static. Hooks up easily, is a great size. Perfect for what we need it for.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Parent Monitor quit working after 6 mos
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this a good review. The parent monitor suddenly stopped working. I have tried to pair it with the other monitor but no luck. It just keeps beeping. Originally the parent monitor had static noise in the background but you could hear but now nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Guido E.

customer_reviews.title: next time pay a bit more
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is very cheaply made. having problem with the receiving end of the monitor. Not hearing any sound from my baby's room. don't know why. am going to send it back,but no paper work came with the monitor on how to return if there is a problem
customer_reviews.author: Susan Insana

customer_reviews.title: Great value and clear sound!
customer_reviews.text: When you're a first time mom you think you need a video monitor and all the wifi fancy stuff... But after the second one... Let me tell you... this right here is all you really need. Really clear audio and I love that you can talk back to them. I have had no electric/crackling feedback that I had with other monitors. For the money I'm very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Pearce

customer_reviews.title: This monitor isnt reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this unit would be what we needed during the night. However, the unit stays plugged in, yet it turns itself on and off. It isn't noise activated, otherwise it would never turn off. So if you are worried about your baby, dont purchase this unit. I'm rather dissatisfied with it. Twice now I've asked the question about it, but the question seems to disappear.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin

customer_reviews.title: Reliable. The receiver works over my entire yard.
customer_reviews.text: Glad I went with this sound only device instead of unreliable video ones. It does pick up back ground noise, but is tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: R. Tim

customer_reviews.title: has good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: It picks up very well and the parent monitor is very clear. It took a long time to charge the parent monitor, like 24 hours, before it could be used. There were no instructions that came this monitor, which might have been helpful about charging the battery for such a long length of time, before it could be used.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised with the quality of this monitor. I use it for my 6mo. I was very concerned when I first got these in the mail with how cheap they felt and looked... but they have incredible sound, they don’t have static and feedback like my old one, and they’re user friendly...which is nice when I’m getting up half asleep at 3 am.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Audio Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this audio baby monitor to be able to hear my special needs child if she made the slightest sound. The audio quality is really good that I could even hear the centralized air conditioner in the background. I’m very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Does a great monitoring job
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it to monitor a senior. Helful but the one with the camara is better.
customer_reviews.author: Skinner

customer_reviews.title: A good investment for a concerned parent.
customer_reviews.text: It is very sensitive. It picked up my cat's meow when she walked into Jason's room.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Knight

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has Alzheimer's and the monitor let me know if she needs help or if she does not feel well.
customer_reviews.author: bruno

customer_reviews.title: Only Lasts a Couple Months
customer_reviews.text: The monitor worked fine for about 2 months when it suddenly stopped connecting. I contacted the company and they sent a replacement. The 2nd set did the exact same thing after using it for just over two months. I tried to contact the company again and they did not respond.
customer_reviews.author: Ben C.

customer_reviews.title: This works for what we need
customer_reviews.text: This works for what we need - a monitor for our older child so we can hear her down the hall at night when bedroom doors are all shut. The battery life is terrible and the "parent" unit has to be plugged in all the time. It also picks up background sounds of a white noise machine. But for the price, it works for what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Does not work very good can’t hear noises very good from other room
customer_reviews.author: Annette M. Packer

customer_reviews.title: Had to return; did not work
customer_reviews.text: It did not work in my house. Returned it and received money back.
customer_reviews.author: Geo. S

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Worked okay at first. Battery life definitely could have been better. But after only using for 7 months it’s garbage. The parent unit will not charge at all. I’m fact, where the charger plugs into the unit, that part is actually broken. So super cheap and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it needs to do! We turn it on while the baby naps and sleeps at night and we can barely hear her hatch sound machine that is relatively close to the monitor, but we can her hear clearly when she wakes or moves.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Great monitors
customer_reviews.text: Like some other have written, the product seems flimsy when you first hold them, but the sound is very clear and works across a long distance. I can use it from one end of our 1800 sq foot to the other.
customer_reviews.author: leenorris

customer_reviews.title: two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: it worked well for the little time i needed it
customer_reviews.author: David E Van Horn

customer_reviews.title: Basic, easy to use and picks up sound well. Very simple to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Do like the portability and range of the receiver unit. Have taken walks down our street for 1/2 a block and still comes in strong. Handy clip is nice too. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Kindig

customer_reviews.title: Great sound! Portable. Discreet!
customer_reviews.text: Guess what needs monitoring more than babies? Teenagers! Babysitters! Lol. These little things are quite handy, believe me!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfactory
customer_reviews.text: The battery will not last through the night. Even when it is plugged in it will not charge properly. I keep the volume all the way up but at times it will not project sound unless I hit one of the buttons on the front to wake the machine up. It is a cheap model and not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi L Pine

customer_reviews.title: Micro USB was very hard to fit in the Parent Unit -
customer_reviews.text: Micro USB fit poorly into Parent Unit - had to apply pressure beyond that of any micro USB to cell phone. In 60 days the fitting broke off. I would not purchase again and would respect a refund since the fit was defective upon delivery
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A Brotherton

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: The product stop working for some reason. So I'm not happy at this point with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Graves

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: After about 5 weeks, quit working. When it was working, it was a great unit. However, the charging cord could have been a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Reef Runner

customer_reviews.title: Works well.  Very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: My husband’s illness has him a hospital bed in our spare bedroom. The monitor is perfect. I can now hear the bed alarm. I can also talk to him when he is having a difficult time, This has given me great peace of mind
customer_reviews.author: MAH

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item ahead of time for use with my first baby. Just tried to use it for the first time and the button on one of the units got stuck when trying to power on. Cheaply made product. I was not even able to use it to know if the sound quality or range is good or not.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Severs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my mother in law that has dementia and her caretaker loves it, helps greatly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gloeckner

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: You would think making a product that has been around for 100 years would not be that difficult. Well think again. The think does not hold a charge and does not have wall plug for the main unit. Also sound quality is pretty bad with lots of static.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well until it broke after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked well until it broke after 6 months. The parent unit no longer charges making it entirely useless. Shouldn't expect more from cheap made in China crap I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Belknap

customer_reviews.title: Power Lights
customer_reviews.text: The fact that there is no visible way to quickly tell if the base unit is turned is a big annoyance. There needs to be a second light or a change of color to show that the base unit is turned on, not just plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the product. Never dis get it to work. Just returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: This is good for the elderly also!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for us as my husband is not in good health so I can hear him while he is in bed and I am in other parts of the hOuse or even in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya L Manley

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Comes in loud and clear. Nice devices. Very portable. I like the clip option.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: A good company to do business with.
customer_reviews.text: Service was fast, equipment well made, a good value for the money. I paid 50% more for one three years ago but this was far better.
customer_reviews.author: Al Pal

customer_reviews.title: Led indicator and power adaptor
customer_reviews.text: In the book it says after 4.5 hours when it is fully charged led indicator will turn green. But mine is always red, i do not know it is a problem or not! And there is only one power adaptor but we need two!
customer_reviews.author: MUSTAFA EMRE UZUNHUSEYINOGLU

customer_reviews.title: Quits after 5 werks
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product until it quit working. Suddenly it just beeps, does not work at all. I have had it 5 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Not Reliable
customer_reviews.text: This is not a reliable device. Unfortunately, the devices button started to malfunction within a week of use. If the button had not malfunctioned, I would give this device a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Himmat Singh

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality on this product was never good, battery life almost non-existent and, stopped working all together after six months, even when plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the fact that I have to press many times in order to hear my baby other than that is good
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Monitor for under $30!!
customer_reviews.text: We use this in my daughter's room, since I am a heavy sleeper and do not hear her calling me some nights. This works perfect!!!! Makes her feel safe knowing that I am just a whisper away.
customer_reviews.author: Janis

customer_reviews.title: Don't  waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Parent monitor died after 2 weeks of use. Won't charge and won't stay on when plugged in to power. The sound and two way talk was great for the short time it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Spratt

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Product is broken already. And I’m very disappointed in things I’ve bought through amazon! Poor quality, constant shipping damage! There has to be a better company!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a couple of days and then sound quality is terrible
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: Received in perfect condition, operates as described, and sound quality better than expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Northeastdude

customer_reviews.title: Won't charge after ONLY 2 months use!
customer_reviews.text: Only 2 months old and will not hold a charge anymore. Stay away, buy something else!
customer_reviews.author: Craig A Rentz

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Stop working after 8 months. I can't contact Amazon customer service for help. Don't buy battery sucks too.
customer_reviews.author: Javier F Marrero

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, then broke within a month
customer_reviews.text: Monitors were great, until they weren't. We have had monitors for not even 2 months, and one of them has stopped working completely.
customer_reviews.author: Hakyl

customer_reviews.title: Worked 2 months n wont hold charge. Trash.
customer_reviews.text: Bought august 8 Quit holdin a charge october 15. now useless trash!!!!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: really cheap, buy a better on
customer_reviews.text: the static is awful and they only give one charger not two to plug into the wall. the battery doesn't last.
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Helpful monitoring system
customer_reviews.text: Keeping tabs on children across the house. I can listen, I can talk with the push of a button. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Daniel Kilbourne

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months of use
customer_reviews.text: This product worked fine for three months and then randomly died on us and will no longer turn on. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mother approved
customer_reviews.text: This product is reliable and affordable. Just what we needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a short period of time then crapped out. Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Donald W. Silliman

customer_reviews.title: It's already broken
customer_reviews.text: Ours is no longer working after a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Franklin

customer_reviews.title: It serves the purpose I bought it for.
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my elderly mom. I like it
customer_reviews.author: rosalinda castillo

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Took me a bit of time to figure out how to use, but as soon as I did I was happy with it. (I use it to monitor my 91 year-old husband when he is ill.) Only problem I have, which doesn't detract from the Monitor, is that it picks up every tiny sound which I don't need to hear (like the rustling of sheets during any movement in bed). I guess that is background noise. Perhaps there is a way to adjust that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Willcare Baby Monitor, Portable Digital Audio Baby Monitor with Up to 1000ft Operating Range, Two-Way Talking Feature, Heavy-Duty Rechargeable Battery & HD Sound Listening System
product_meta.description:
Key features of our audio baby monitor: 

 * PREMIUM BABY MONITOR - Our digital audio baby monitors offers higher value than other baby alarms!
 * CLEAR SOUND - Crystal clear audio with guaranteed zero interference!
 * LONG-LASTING POWER - Powered via 600mah, heavy duty battery which can last up to 20 hours.
 * EASY TO USE - Easy to setup by simply plugging the units in and they are automatically paired together.
 * LONG RANGE - With a range up to 1000 meters and an out of range alarm, you can never be far away from your baby!
 * COMFORT NIGHT LIGHT - Allows you to take a sneak peep at your baby in the dark without waking him/her up.
 * SMART ECO MODE - Uses less energy and also cancels more background noise than other infant monitors can!
 * TWO WAY TALK - Soothe your crying baby and let him/her hear your voice anytime!
 * ALL OCCASION GIFT SET It is the perfect baby shower, bride to be, wedding, nursing mother gift!


Package Includes: 
1 x Baby Unit

1 x Parent Unit

1 x Power Adapter

1 x User Manual

2 x USB cable
feature_bullets: STAY CONNECTED TO YOUR BABY – Baby Monitors and Listening Systems utilizes stable 2.4GHZ wireless technology, which provides reliable and excellent connection to your baby up to 200 feet indoors or 1000 feet outdoors. Out of range alert notifies you, whenever you are straying too far away so that you can keep your baby close by!

HD SOUND WITH TALKBACK FEATURE – Hear every breath, gurgle or cry that your baby makes with crystal clear sound made possible by our HD Audio Baby Monitor. Each parent unit also comes with a talk back feature, with which you can soothe and comfort your baby, as the noise reduction microphones eliminate all forms of static or white noise interferences!

PORTABLE WITH LONG BATTERY LIFE – The rechargeable parent unit comes with a 550mAh heavy duty battery which can hold a charge for up to 20 hours. Attach the parent unit to yourself with the aid of the BONUS belt clip, if you intend taking it along as you do chores around the house or walk in the garden!

NIGHT LIGHT FEATURE AND SMART ECO MODE – Turn the nightlight on and off from the parent unit whenever you want to sneak a peek at the baby in a dark room without waking him/her! Just plug the infant monitors in and they are automatically paired together with the Smart ECO mode feature eliminating any background noise.

BEST BABY MONITORS – Since our digital audio infant monitor provides crystal clear transmission allowing you to hear and talk to your baby via the connected parent unit, eliminates any annoying noise, is portable and can be carried everywhere, it makes sense to get our superior, high-performance baby sound, monitors!
